languages.text: "Да... П-простите, Ваша Светлость... Я побегу доложу Наместнику... Убили леди-посланницу, горе-то какое!"
"Yes... I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I'll just go report to the Liege... They killed her, they killed my lady, oh, this is terrible!"
languages.original_text: "Да... П-простите, Ваша Светлость... Я побегу доложу Наместнику... Убили леди-посланницу, горе-то какое!"

"Yes... I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I'll just go report to the Liege... They killed her, they killed my lady, oh, this is terrible!"

languages.text: 「はい…申し訳ございません、陛下…すぐに領主に報告いたします…ああ、妻まで殺されてしまった…なんていうことだ！」
languages.original_text: "Yes... I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I'll just go report to the Liege... They killed her, they killed my lady, oh, this is terrible!"

traits.locale_text: 「はい…申し訳ございません、陛下…すぐに領主に報告いたします…ああ、妻まで殺されてしまった…なんていうことだ！」

languages.text: “遵命……对不起，大人……我这就去向总督汇报……他们杀了她，他们杀了我的夫人。噢，这太可怕了！”
languages.original_text: "Yes... I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I'll just go report to the Liege... They killed her, they killed my lady, oh, this is terrible!"

traits.locale_text: “遵命……对不起，大人……我这就去向总督汇报……他们杀了她，他们杀了我的夫人。噢，这太可怕了！”

languages.text: «Sí... Lo siento, {mf|milord|milady}... Me marcho a informar al Señor... La han matado, han matado a mi señora... Ay, ¡esto es terrible!».
languages.original_text: "Yes... I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I'll just go report to the Liege... They killed her, they killed my lady, oh, this is terrible!"

traits.locale_text: «Sí... Lo siento, {mf|milord|milady}... Me marcho a informar al Señor... La han matado, han matado a mi señora... Ay, ¡esto es terrible!».

languages.text: « Oui... Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. Je vais faire mon rapport au suzerain... Ils l'ont tuée, ils ont tué ma dame... Oh, mais quelle horreur ! »
languages.original_text: "Yes... I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I'll just go report to the Liege... They killed her, they killed my lady, oh, this is terrible!"

traits.locale_text: « Oui... Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. Je vais faire mon rapport au suzerain... Ils l'ont tuée, ils ont tué ma dame... Oh, mais quelle horreur ! »

languages.text: "Ja ... Es tut mir leid, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich erstatte dem Lehnsherren umgehend Bericht ... Sie haben sie getötet, sie haben meine Lady getötet, oh, das ist furchtbar!"
languages.original_text: "Yes... I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I'll just go report to the Liege... They killed her, they killed my lady, oh, this is terrible!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja ... Es tut mir leid, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich erstatte dem Lehnsherren umgehend Bericht ... Sie haben sie getötet, sie haben meine Lady getötet, oh, das ist furchtbar!"

languages.text: "Elbette... Affedersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Derhâl Emîr'e haber edeceğim... Öldürdüler ya, leydimi öldürdüler! Vay ki ne vay!"
languages.original_text: "Yes... I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I'll just go report to the Liege... They killed her, they killed my lady, oh, this is terrible!"

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Üzgünüm {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Gidip Emîr'e derhâl bildiriyorum. Onu öldürdüler, leydimi öldürdüler, ah, korkunç!"
